nodes.text: Yaspers was a female Human technician of the Galactic Republic during the Galactic War. Around 3641 BBY she was stationed at the Prison Administration Center during the Invasion of Belsavis.

Technician Yaspers appeared in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as a Mods Vendor for Republic players on Belsavis. With the release of Game Update 4.0 on October 20, 2015, Yaspers was removed from the game along with the rest of the Mods Vendors.
